title: Dont Leave Me
summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.
description: Just install it and never leave your phone behind again.This will monitor the connection between your phone and android wearable (like the Samsung Gear Live, LG  G Watch or Moto 360) and warn you if your phone get out of range.The application will is small and simple, it doesn't use any additional battery or cpu resources while the devices are in proximity.
descriptionHTML:
Just install it and never leave your phone behind again.

This will monitor the connection between your phone and android wearable (like the Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch or Moto 360) and warn you if your phone get out of range.

The application will is small and simple, it doesn't use any additional battery or cpu resources while the devices are in proximity.
comments: It works. One big problem. It will run till it runs down your watch battery, if you leave your watch behind at your home. There is not any way to tell it to automatically turn off the alert after xx number of seconds. Example I left my watch on the charger, but took my phn. The app ran the entire time I was gone. Charger could not keep up with the drain.
It wors fine on a gear 2 neo Thanks
Does not work for the gear 2 neo
Does not work for the gear 2 neo Does not work for the gear 2 neo
